about_the_game:
Marine Battles offers you a refreshed Battleship experience that is purely built for multiplayer! Create a lobby and play with your friends or go to battle with strangers. New options coming soon including:

  • Password-protected private lobbies
  • Steam Friends integration
  • Customize lobbies with your own fleet configurations



Ships in Marine Battles are not bound to the classic grid you know from the original Battleships. Place them freely within your battlefield section and play hide and seek with your opponent. For some reason they’re still taking turns of 90 degrees, though. 🤔



Gone are the cozy days of playing in turns. Marine Battles embraces the boiling heat of a naval battlefield in real-time battles. Use the different properties of your ships to seek and destroy the opponent’s fleet as efficiently as possible.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: i5 or Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7 or Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Return to the naval battlefield and beat your enemies in fast-paced multiplayer battles! Place your ships freely instead of having a grid and battle in real-time instead turns. Use your fleet's strengths to sink the opponent's fleet first. Are you going to succeed?
